public boolean addCustomer(CustomerDetails customerDetails)
This method adds a customer to the bank's database

Parameters:
firstName - - The first name of the customer being added
lastName - - The last name of the customer being added
address - - The adress of the customer being added
city - - The city the new customer lives in
phone - - The phone number of the new customer
email - - The email address of the new customer
bestTime - - The best time the customer can come in
Returns:
boolean - A variable indicating the customer has been added or not

createAccountForCustomer

public boolean createAccountForCustomer(int customerId,
                                        int employeeId,
                                        int accountType,
                                        float specVariable)
This method creates an account for a user. Upon doing so, the emoployee creating the account will be able designated as the account-supervisor/loan-supervison based on the type of account being created

Parameters:
customerId - - The id of the customer the account is being created for
employeeId - - The id of the employee the
accountType - - The type of account being created (0 - Savings Account, 1 - Checking Account)
specVariable - - This can represent if the savings rate if it's a savings account, and it can represent the overdraft if it's a checking account
Returns:
boolean - A variable indicating the customer her been removed or not

int - The id of the newly added account based on the MAX() sql function
